name: Arkon 8.5" Windshield Gooseneck Satellite Radio Mount

reviews.name: Arkon 8.5" Windshield Gooseneck Satellite Radio Mount
reviews.reviewText: The mounting system/brackets that come standard with SiruisXM radios are poor at best. After shopping around and only coming up with outrageously priced brackets I located the Arkon 8.5" Radio Mount. IT WORKS PERFECTLY and it is relatively inexpensive. The "gooseneck" itself is a little tight/stiff, other than that I can't think of anything wrong with this product.
reviews.title: Works Perfectly

reviews.name: Arkon 8.5" Windshield Gooseneck Satellite Radio Mount
reviews.reviewText: The design is great and it's just what we needed. It sticks to the window and hasn't come off. The piece that attaches to the back of the radio, however, does not match the back of my radio. I'm going to have to modify it. Maybe the manufacturer could modify it or include a few different pieces.
reviews.title: Sirius Window Mount

reviews.name: Arkon 8.5" Windshield Gooseneck Satellite Radio Mount
reviews.reviewText: Works perfect for my trucker husband!
reviews.title: exactly what a trucker needs

reviews.name: Arkon 8.5" Windshield Gooseneck Satellite Radio Mount
reviews.reviewText: It works great for me for my XM it stays in the window securely and I can move the neck how ever I want.
reviews.title: Serius XM holder
